update OILDB.WELL_INFO
WELL_NAME = #{wellName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WELL_NAME_ALIAS = #{wellNameAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AREA_NAME = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATION_ID = #{stationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STATION_NAME = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WELL_LONG = #{wellLong,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WELL_LAT = #{wellLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
W_PROPERTY = #{wProperty,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
W_PROPERTY_NAME = #{wPropertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WELL_TYPE = #{wellType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WELL_TYPE_NAME = #{wellTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUMP_TYPE = #{pumpType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PUMP_TYPE_NAME = #{pumpTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WELL_ICO = #{wellIco,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMM_MARK = #{commMark,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RTU_TYPE = #{rtuType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RTU_IPADDR = #{rtuIpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WELL_NUM = #{wellNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INVESTMENT_DATE = #{investmentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GROUP_NAME = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WELL_STROKE = #{wellStroke,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
V_MARK = #{vMark,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
V_IPADDR = #{vIpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ELEC_BASE_V = #{elecBaseV,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AUTO_MARK = #{autoMark,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARK = #{mark,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STIME = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
V_VIRTUAL_PORT = #{vVirtualPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMM_TYPE = #{commType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMM_TYPE_NAME = #{commTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BLOCK_ID = #{blockId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BLOCK_NAME = #{blockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OIL_STORAGE_TYPE = #{oilStorageType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OIL_STORAGE_NAME = #{oilStorageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RUN_STATE = #{runState,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A11_CODE = #{a11Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A11_CODE_FATHER = #{a11CodeFather,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WELL_ADDR = #{wellAddr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ELEC_ADDR = #{elecAddr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOAD_ADDR = #{loadAddr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update OILDB.WELL_INFO set WELL_NAME = #{wellName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WELL_NAME_ALIAS = #{wellNameAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AREA_NAME = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATION_ID = #{stationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STATION_NAME = #{stationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WELL_LONG = #{wellLong,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WELL_LAT = #{wellLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, W_PROPERTY = #{wProperty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, W_PROPERTY_NAME = #{wPropertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WELL_TYPE = #{wellType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WELL_TYPE_NAME = #{wellTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUMP_TYPE = #{pumpType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PUMP_TYPE_NAME = #{pumpTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WELL_ICO = #{wellIco,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMM_MARK = #{commMark,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RTU_TYPE = #{rtuType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RTU_IPADDR = #{rtuIpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WELL_NUM = #{wellNum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INVESTMENT_DATE = #{investmentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GROUP_NAME = #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WELL_STROKE = #{wellStroke,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, V_MARK = #{vMark,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, V_IPADDR = #{vIpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ELEC_BASE_V = #{elecBaseV,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AUTO_MARK = #{autoMark,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARK = #{mark,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STIME = #{stime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, V_VIRTUAL_PORT = #{vVirtualPort,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMM_TYPE = #{commType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMM_TYPE_NAME = #{commTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BLOCK_ID = #{blockId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BLOCK_NAME = #{blockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OIL_STORAGE_TYPE = #{oilStorageType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OIL_STORAGE_NAME = #{oilStorageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUN_STATE = #{runState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A11_CODE = #{a11Code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A11_CODE_FATHER = #{a11CodeFather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WELL_ADDR = #{wellAddr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ELEC_ADDR = #{elecAddr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOAD_ADDR = #{loadAddr,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select id,well_name,station_name,area_name from OILDB.WELL_info where Station_ID = #{stationId} and w_property=0 and mark=0 and auto_mark=0 ORDER BY id

select id,well_name from OILDB.WELL_info where id not in( select well_id from WARN_SYS_CONFIG where WELL_ID is not null union select well_id from WARN_LIMIT_CONFIG where WELL_ID is not null union select well_id from WARN_GT_CONFIG where WELL_ID is not null group by well_id ) ORDER BY id
